highlights.name: Abel Monument
highlights.description: Monument dedicated to mathematician Niels Henrik Abel, sculpted by Gustav Vigeland in Royal Palace Park.
highlights.description_en: Monument dedicated to mathematician Niels Henrik Abel, sculpted by Gustav Vigeland in Royal Palace Park.
highlights.description_tr: Kraliyet Sarayı Parkı'nda bulunan, Gustav Vigeland tarafından yapılmış, matematikçi Niels Henrik Abel anıtı.

highlights.name: Aker Brygge
highlights.description: Old shipyard, now luxury wharf filled with popular restaurants and shops.
highlights.description_en: Old shipyard, now luxury wharf filled with popular restaurants and shops.
highlights.tips: Buradan gün batımı ve kale manzarası çok güzeldir.
highlights.tips_en: Unknown sunset and fortress view from here is very beautiful.

highlights.name: Akerselva River Walk
highlights.description: Scenic 8km trail along the river featuring industrial history, waterfalls, and lush parks.
highlights.description_en: Scenic 8km trail along the river featuring industrial history, waterfalls, and lush parks.
highlights.tips_en: Must see the Mølla waterfall.
highlights.description_tr: Endüstriyel tarih, şelaleler ve yemyeşil parklar sunan, nehir boyunca uzanan 8 kilometrelik manzaralı yürüyüş yolu.

highlights.name: Akerselva Waterfall (Mølla)
highlights.description: One of Oslo's most impressive urban waterfalls, located near the vibrant Beierbrua bridge.
highlights.description_en: One of Oslo's most impressive urban waterfalls, located near the vibrant Beierbrua bridge.
highlights.description_tr: Beierbrua köprüsü yakınında bulunan, Oslo'nun en etkileyici şehir içi şelalelerinden biri.

highlights.name: Akershus Fortress
highlights.description: Medieval castle and royal residence built in the late 13th century. It has served as a strategic military stronghold and offers historical museum tours and views of the harbor.
highlights.description_en: Medieval castle and royal residence built in the late 13th century. It has served as a strategic military stronghold and offers historical museum tours and views of the harbor.
highlights.tips: Disney'in Frozen filmindeki Arendelle kalesine ilham vermiştir.
highlights.tips_en: It inspired the Arendelle castle in Disney's Frozen movie.
highlights.description_tr: 13. yüzyılın sonunda inşa edilmiş Orta Çağ kalesi ve kraliyet rezidansı. Stratejik bir askeri kale olarak hizmet vermiş olup günümüzde tarihi müze turları ve liman manzarası sunmaktadır.

highlights.name: Andre til Høyre
highlights.description: Stylish cocktail bar designed like a retro apartment with a 'house party' vibe.
highlights.description_en: Stylish cocktail bar designed like a retro apartment with a 'house party' vibe.
highlights.description_tr: Retro bir daire gibi tasarlanmış, 'ev partisi' havasında şık kokteyl bar.

highlights.name: Armed Forces Museum
highlights.description: Museum in Akershus Fortress covering Norway's military history from Vikings to present.
highlights.description_en: Museum in Akershus Fortress covering Norway's military history from Vikings to present.
highlights.description_tr: Akershus Kalesi içinde, Vikinglerden günümüze Norveç askeri tarihini anlatan müze.

highlights.name: Astrup Fearnley Museet
highlights.description: One of the world's most important contemporary art collections in a building designed by Renzo Piano.
highlights.description_en: One of the world's most important contemporary art collections in a building designed by Renzo Piano.
highlights.tips_en: Sculpture park around the museum is free.

highlights.name: Baker Hansen
highlights.description: Historic bakery chain since 1861, famous for cinnamon buns and gluten-free options.
highlights.description_en: Historic bakery chain since 1861, famous for cinnamon buns and gluten-free options.
highlights.description_tr: 1861'den beri hizmet veren, tarçınlı çörekleri ve glutensiz seçenekleriyle ünlü tarihi fırın.

highlights.name: Barcode Project
highlights.description: Modern architecture district consisting of thin tall buildings resembling a barcode.
highlights.description_en: Modern architecture district consisting of thin tall buildings resembling a barcode.
highlights.tips: Köprüden fotoğraf çekmek için harika bir açıdır.
highlights.tips_en: Great angle to take photos from the bridge.

highlights.name: Birkelunden
highlights.description: Charming park in Grünerløkka known for its popular Sunday flea market (Birkelunden Marked).
highlights.description_en: Charming park in Grünerløkka known for its popular Sunday flea market (Birkelunden Marked).
highlights.description_tr: Grünerløkka'da bulunan, Pazar günleri kurulan bit pazarıyla (Birkelunden Marked) ünlü şirin park.

highlights.name: Bleikøya
highlights.description: Idyllic island in the Oslofjord known for its small, historic summer cabins and nature reserve.
highlights.description_en: Idyllic island in the Oslofjord known for its small, historic summer cabins and nature reserve.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo Fiyordu'ndaki küçük, tarihi yazlık kulübeleri ve doğa rezerviyle bilinen huzurlu ada.

highlights.name: Blå
highlights.description: Legendary independent music club by the Akerselva river, famous for jazz and industrial atmosphere.
highlights.description_en: Legendary independent music club by the Akerselva river, famous for jazz and industrial atmosphere.
highlights.description_tr: Akerselva nehri kıyısında, caz müziği ve endüstriyel atmosferiyle ünlü efsanevi kulüp.
highlights.tips_en: Outdoor area is very nice in summer.

highlights.name: Botanical Garden Greenhouses
highlights.description: Victorian-style greenhouses featuring diverse exotic plants and giant water lilies.
highlights.description_en: Victorian-style greenhouses featuring diverse exotic plants and giant water lilies.
highlights.description_tr: Egzotik bitkiler ve dev nilüferlere ev sahipliği yapan Victoria tarzı tarihi seralar.

highlights.name: Botanisering (The Sprout)
highlights.description: Bronze sculpture by Sivert Donali depicting a figure examining a plant.
highlights.description_en: Bronze sculpture by Sivert Donali depicting a figure examining a plant.
highlights.description_tr: Sivert Donali imzalı, bir bitkiyi inceleyen bir figürü tasvir eden bronz heykel.

highlights.name: Bygdøy Peninsula
highlights.description: Oslo's most beautiful peninsula with museums, beaches and royal manor.
highlights.description_en: Oslo's most beautiful peninsula with museums, beaches and royal manor.
highlights.tips_en: Great to explore by bike.

highlights.name: Chillout Travel Store
highlights.description: Unique travel concept store combining a bookshop, travel agency, gear shop, and café.
highlights.description_en: Unique travel concept store combining a bookshop, travel agency, gear shop, and café.
highlights.description_tr: Kitapçı, seyahat acentesi, ekipman mağazası ve kafeyi birleştiren eşsiz bir seyahat konsept mağazası.

highlights.name: Christian IV Statue
highlights.description: Bronze statue of King Christian IV, the city's founder, located in Stortorvet square.
highlights.description_en: Bronze statue of King Christian IV, the city's founder, located in Stortorvet square.
highlights.description_tr: Stortorvet meydanında bulunan, şehrin kurucusu Kral Christian IV'ün bronz heykeli.

highlights.name: Damstredet
highlights.description: Historic cobbled street lined with colorful, well-preserved 18th-century timber houses.
highlights.description_en: Historic cobbled street lined with colorful, well-preserved 18th-century timber houses.
highlights.tips: Fotoğraf çekmek için şehrin en şirin sokağıdır.
highlights.tips_en: It is the cutest street in the city for taking photos.
highlights.description_tr: Renkli ve iyi korunmuş 18. yüzyıl ahşap evleriyle çevrili tarihi arnavut kaldırımlı sokak.

highlights.name: Damstredet Street
highlights.description: A picturesque and idyllic residential area offering a glimpse into old Christiania (Oslo).
highlights.description_en: A picturesque and idyllic residential area offering a glimpse into old Christiania (Oslo).
highlights.tips_en: Great spot for photos.
highlights.description_tr: Eski Christiania'ya (Oslo) bir bakış sunan, pitoresk ve pastoral bir yerleşim bölgesi.

highlights.name: Dapper
highlights.description: Trendy men's concept store offering clothing, grooming products, a barbershop, and bike accessories.
highlights.description_en: Trendy men's concept store offering clothing, grooming products, a barbershop, and bike accessories.
highlights.description_tr: Giyim, bakım ürünleri, berber ve bisiklet aksesuarları sunan trend erkek konsept mağazası.

highlights.name: Deichman Bjørvika
highlights.description: Award-winning modern public library featuring a striking cantilevered design and innovative light shafts.
highlights.description_en: Award-winning modern public library featuring a striking cantilevered design and innovative light shafts.
highlights.description_tr: Çarpıcı konsol tasarımı ve yenilikçi ışık şaftlarıyla ödül kazanmış modern halk kütüphanesi.
highlights.tips_en: Has cinema and gaming areas too.

highlights.name: Deichman Grünerløkka
highlights.description: Modern library in a historic building, known for its comics section (Serieteket) and cinema.
highlights.description_en: Modern library in a historic building, known for its comics section (Serieteket) and cinema.
highlights.description_tr: Tarihi bir binada yer alan, çizgi roman bölümü (Serieteket) ve sinemasıyla ünlü modern kütüphane.

highlights.name: Deichman Majorstuen
highlights.description: Largest branch of the Deichman library network, offering extensive books, comics, and study spaces.
highlights.description_en: Largest branch of the Deichman library network, offering extensive books, comics, and study spaces.
highlights.description_tr: Geniş kitap, çizgi roman koleksiyonu ve çalışma alanları sunan, Deichman ağının en büyük şube kütüphanesi.

highlights.name: Drøbak Day Trip
highlights.description: Charming town by fjord. Has year-round Christmas house.
highlights.description_en: Charming town by fjord. Has year-round Christmas house.
highlights.tips_en: Ferry ride is very enjoyable.

highlights.name: Dykkar (The Diver)
highlights.description: Striking stainless steel sculpture of a diver at Aker Brygge by Ola Enstad.
highlights.description_en: Striking stainless steel sculpture of a diver at Aker Brygge by Ola Enstad.
highlights.description_tr: Aker Brygge'de bulunan, Ola Enstad imzalı, paslanmaz çelikten yapılmış çarpıcı dalgıç heykeli.

highlights.name: Døgnvill Burger Vulkan
highlights.description: American diner style burger joint in Vulkan, known for high quality local ingredients.
highlights.description_en: American diner style burger joint in Vulkan, known for high quality local ingredients.
highlights.description_tr: Vulkan'da bulunan, yüksek kaliteli yerel malzemeleriyle ünlü Amerikan tarzı burgerci.

highlights.name: Ekebergparken
highlights.description: A vast wooded park on the Ekeberg hillside offering spectacular panoramas over the Oslofjord.
highlights.description_en: A vast wooded park on the Ekeberg hillside offering spectacular panoramas over the Oslofjord.
highlights.tips_en: 'Munch Spot' (background of The Scream) is here.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo fiyordu üzerinde muazzam manzaralar sunan, Ekeberg yamacında yer alan geniş ormanlık park.

highlights.name: Ekebergparken Sculpture Park
highlights.description: World-class heritage park with over 30 sculptures by masters like Dalí, Renoir, and Rodin.
highlights.description_en: World-class heritage park with over 30 sculptures by masters like Dalí, Renoir, and Rodin.
highlights.tips: Edvard Munch'un 'Çığlık'ı burada ilham aldığı yer.
highlights.tips_en: Where Edvard Munch was inspired for 'The Scream'.
highlights.description_tr: Dalí, Renoir ve Rodin gibi ustaların 30'dan fazla heykelini barındıran dünya çapında bir sanat parkı.

highlights.name: Emanuel Vigeland Museum
highlights.description: Hidden mausoleum-museum, dimly lit, covered in frescoes and with incredible acoustics.
highlights.description_en: Hidden mausoleum-museum, dimly lit, covered in frescoes and with incredible acoustics.
highlights.tips: Sadece pazar günleri açıktır, önceden kontrol edin.
highlights.tips_en: Only open on Sundays, check beforehand.

highlights.name: Engebret Café
highlights.description: Oslo's oldest restaurant open since 1857. Place where Ibsen and Munch were regulars.
highlights.description_en: Oslo's oldest restaurant open since 1857. Place where Ibsen and Munch were regulars.
highlights.tips: Klasik 'Smørbrød' (açık sandviç) öğle yemeği için idealdir.
highlights.tips_en: Classic 'Smørbrød' (open sandwich) is ideal for lunch.

highlights.name: Farine
highlights.description: Artisan sourdough bakery in Kampen known for its exceptional cardamom buns and French-inspired pastries.
highlights.description_en: Artisan sourdough bakery in Kampen known for its exceptional cardamom buns and French-inspired pastries.
highlights.description_tr: Kampen'de yer alan, olağanüstü kakuleli çörekleri ve Fransız esintili pastalarıyla ünlü zanaatkar fırın.

highlights.name: Fearless Girl Oslo
highlights.description: Replica of the famous Bronx sculpture, currently located at Drammensveien in support of Iranian women.
highlights.description_en: Replica of the famous Bronx sculpture, currently located at Drammensveien in support of Iranian women.
highlights.description_tr: Amerikalı sanatçının ünlü heykelinin bir replikası; şu an İranlı kadınlara destek için Drammensveien'de.

highlights.name: Fiskeriet
highlights.description: Renowned combined fish market and seafood restaurant in the city center, famous for its exceptionally fresh catch and legendary fish soup.
highlights.description_en: Renowned combined fish market and seafood restaurant in the city center, famous for its exceptionally fresh catch and legendary fish soup.
highlights.description_tr: Şehir merkezinde bulunan, olağanüstü tazelikteki ürünleri ve efsanevi balık çorbasıyla ünlü, balık pazarı ve deniz ürünleri restoranı kombinasyonu.
highlights.tips_en: Creamy fish soup (Fiskesuppe) is legendary.

highlights.name: Fiskeriet Shop
highlights.description: Renowned combined fish market and seafood restaurant in the city center, famous for its exceptionally fresh catch and legendary fish soup.
highlights.description_en: Renowned combined fish market and seafood restaurant in the city center, famous for its exceptionally fresh catch and legendary fish soup.
highlights.description_tr: Şehir merkezinde bulunan, olağanüstü tazelikteki ürünleri ve efsanevi balık çorbasıyla ünlü, balık pazarı ve deniz ürünleri restoranı kombinasyonu.

highlights.name: Fons
highlights.description: Unique hair salon and curated vintage shop in Grünerløkka offering handpicked clothing and design.
highlights.description_en: Unique hair salon and curated vintage shop in Grünerløkka offering handpicked clothing and design.
highlights.description_tr: Grünerløkka'da bulunan, özenle seçilmiş kıyafetler ve tasarım ürünleri sunan özgün kuaför ve vintage dükkanı.

highlights.name: Fram Museum
highlights.description: Dedicated to Norwegian polar exploration, this museum houses the original ship 'Fram', the strongest wooden vessel ever built, which sailed to both the North and South Poles.
highlights.description_en: Dedicated to Norwegian polar exploration, this museum houses the original ship 'Fram', the strongest wooden vessel ever built, which sailed to both the North and South Poles.
highlights.tips_en: Watch the Northern Lights simulation.
highlights.description_tr: Norveç kutup keşiflerine adanmış bu müze, hem Kuzey hem de Güney Kutbu'na yelken açmış, şimdiye kadar inşa edilmiş en güçlü ahşap gemi olan orijinal 'Fram' gemisine ev sahipliği yapar.

highlights.name: Frogner Church
highlights.description: Historic Art Nouveau church consecrated in 1907. It is uniquely integrated into a residential street row in Bygdøy allé and features beautiful granite and clay stone details.
highlights.description_en: Historic Art Nouveau church consecrated in 1907. It is uniquely integrated into a residential street row in Bygdøy allé and features beautiful granite and clay stone details.
highlights.description_tr: 1907'de açılan tarihi Art Nouveau kilise. Bygdøy allé'deki bir konut sırasına eşsiz bir şekilde entegre edilmiştir; granit ve kil taşı detaylarıyla dikkat çeker.

highlights.name: Frognerseteren
highlights.description: Historic wooden restaurant built in 'Dragon-style' (Dragestil) atop Holmenkollen. Known for stunning panoramas of Oslofjord and its signature apple cake.
highlights.description_en: Historic wooden restaurant built in 'Dragon-style' (Dragestil) atop Holmenkollen. Known for stunning panoramas of Oslofjord and its signature apple cake.
highlights.description_tr: Holmenkollen'in tepesinde, 'Ejderha tarzı' (Dragestil) ahşap mimarisiyle inşa edilmiş tarihi restoran. Oslo fiyordu manzarası ve meşhur elmalı pastasıyla tanınır.

highlights.name: Fuglen
highlights.description: Unique specialty coffee shop by day and classic cocktail bar by night, featuring a carefully curated mid-century vintage interior where almost everything is for sale.
highlights.description_en: Unique specialty coffee shop by day and classic cocktail bar by night, featuring a carefully curated mid-century vintage interior where almost everything is for sale.
highlights.tips_en: You can buy the furniture you like.
highlights.description_tr: Gündüzleri özel kahve dükkanı, geceleri ise klasik bir kokteyl barı olan; neredeyse her şeyin satılık olduğu özenle seçilmiş retro iç tasarımıyla ünlü mekan.

highlights.name: Fuglen Coffee
highlights.description: Unique specialty coffee shop by day and classic cocktail bar by night, featuring a carefully curated mid-century vintage interior where almost everything is for sale.
highlights.description_en: Unique specialty coffee shop by day and classic cocktail bar by night, featuring a carefully curated mid-century vintage interior where almost everything is for sale.
highlights.tips_en: Turns into cocktail bar in evenings.
highlights.description_tr: Gündüzleri özel kahve dükkanı, geceleri ise klasik bir kokteyl barı olan; neredeyse her şeyin satılık olduğu özenle seçilmiş retro iç tasarımıyla ünlü mekan.

highlights.name: Fuglen Oslo
highlights.description: Unique specialty coffee shop by day and classic cocktail bar by night, featuring a carefully curated mid-century vintage interior where almost everything is for sale.
highlights.description_en: Unique specialty coffee shop by day and classic cocktail bar by night, featuring a carefully curated mid-century vintage interior where almost everything is for sale.
highlights.description_tr: Gündüzleri özel kahve dükkanı, geceleri ise klasik bir kokteyl barı olan; neredeyse her şeyin satılık olduğu özenle seçilmiş retro iç tasarımıyla ünlü mekan.

highlights.name: Godt Brød Grünerløkka
highlights.description: Popular organic bakery known for handmade sourdough bread and legendary cinnamon rolls.
highlights.description_en: Popular organic bakery known for handmade sourdough bread and legendary cinnamon rolls.
highlights.description_tr: El yapımı ekşi mayalı ekmekleri ve efsanevi tarçınlı çörekleriyle ünlü popüler organik fırın.

highlights.name: Gol Stave Church
highlights.description: Beautiful 12th-century wooden church originally from Gol, re-erected at the Norsk Folkemuseum. It is a masterpiece of medieval Norwegian architecture and craftsmanship.
highlights.description_en: Beautiful 12th-century wooden church originally from Gol, re-erected at the Norsk Folkemuseum. It is a masterpiece of medieval Norwegian architecture and craftsmanship.
highlights.tips_en: You can see Viking era architecture.
highlights.description_tr: Aslen Gol'den gelen ve Norsk Folkemuseum'da yeniden inşa edilen 12. yüzyıldan kalma muazzam ahşap kilise. Orta Çağ Norveç mimarisi ve ustalığının bir şaheseridir.

highlights.name: Grains
highlights.description: A French-inspired artisan bakery and creperie in Majorstuen, beloved for its organic sourdough bread, authentic galettes, and cozy atmosphere.
highlights.description_en: A French-inspired artisan bakery and creperie in Majorstuen, beloved for its organic sourdough bread, authentic galettes, and cozy atmosphere.
highlights.description_tr: Majorstuen'de bulunan, organik ekşi mayalı ekmekleri, orijinal krepleri (galette) ve samimi atmosferiyle sevilen Fransız esintili butik fırın.

highlights.name: Grefsenkollen
highlights.description: Hilltop restaurant and viewpoint offering one of the best panoramic vistas of Oslo and the fjord. A popular spot for hiking, cross-country skiing, and summer concerts.
highlights.description_en: Hilltop restaurant and viewpoint offering one of the best panoramic vistas of Oslo and the fjord. A popular spot for hiking, cross-country skiing, and summer concerts.
highlights.tips_en: Try Norwegian meatballs at the restaurant.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo ve fiyort manzarasını en iyi sunan tepelerden biri olan restoran ve seyir noktası. Yürüyüş, kayak ve yaz konserleri için popüler bir destinasyondur.

highlights.name: Grefsenkollen Viewpoint
highlights.description: Hilltop restaurant and viewpoint offering one of the best panoramic vistas of Oslo and the fjord. A popular spot for hiking, cross-country skiing, and summer concerts.
highlights.description_en: Hilltop restaurant and viewpoint offering one of the best panoramic vistas of Oslo and the fjord. A popular spot for hiking, cross-country skiing, and summer concerts.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo ve fiyort manzarasını en iyi sunan tepelerden biri olan restoran ve seyir noktası. Yürüyüş, kayak ve yaz konserleri için popüler bir destinasyondur.

highlights.name: Gressholmen
highlights.description: Quiet island intertwined with nature, inhabited by wild rabbits.
highlights.description_en: Quiet island intertwined with nature, inhabited by wild rabbits.
highlights.tips: Eski havaalanı hangarı şimdi bir kafe.
highlights.tips_en: Old airport hangar is now a cafe.

highlights.name: Grünerløkka
highlights.description: Oslo's coolest neighborhood. Vintage shops, cafes and murals.
highlights.description_en: Oslo's coolest neighborhood. Vintage shops, cafes and murals.
highlights.tips: Pazar günleri Birkelunden parkında bit pazarı kurulur.
highlights.tips_en: Flea market is set up in Birkelunden park on Sundays.

highlights.name: Gutta på Haugen
highlights.description: Premier gourmet grocery store and delicatessen at St. Hanshaugen, offering high-quality local cheeses, cured meats, and international food specialties.
highlights.description_en: Premier gourmet grocery store and delicatessen at St. Hanshaugen, offering high-quality local cheeses, cured meats, and international food specialties.
highlights.description_tr: St. Hanshaugen'de bulunan, yüksek kaliteli yerel peynirler, şarküteri ürünleri ve uluslararası gurme lezzetler sunan seçkin bir şarküteri mağazası.

highlights.name: Handwerk
highlights.description: Artisan cafe and bakery located in the heart of the Botanical Garden, housed in a historic timber building. Famous for its sourdough rolls and organic, local ingredients.
highlights.description_en: Artisan cafe and bakery located in the heart of the Botanical Garden, housed in a historic timber building. Famous for its sourdough rolls and organic, local ingredients.
highlights.description_tr: Botanik Bahçesi'nin kalbinde, tarihi bir ahşap binada yer alan butik kafe ve fırın. Ekşi mayalı sandviçleri, organik ve yerel malzemeleriyle tanınır.

highlights.name: Haralds Vaffel
highlights.description: A cult-favorite waffle shop at Grünerløkka serving traditional heart-shaped Norwegian waffles with classic toppings like brown cheese and jam, as well as creative variations.
highlights.description_en: A cult-favorite waffle shop at Grünerløkka serving traditional heart-shaped Norwegian waffles with classic toppings like brown cheese and jam, as well as creative variations.
highlights.description_tr: Grünerløkka'da bulunan, kahverengi peynir ve reçel gibi klasiklerin yanı sıra yaratıcı çeşitlerle sunulan geleneksel kalp şeklindeki Norveç vaflarıyla ünlü mekan.

highlights.name: Heaven Scent
highlights.description: Exclusive high-end concept perfumery offering a curated selection of niche luxury fragrances, skincare, and apothecary products from renowned international brands.
highlights.description_en: Exclusive high-end concept perfumery offering a curated selection of niche luxury fragrances, skincare, and apothecary products from renowned international brands.
highlights.description_tr: Dünyaca ünlü markalardan seçilmiş niş parfümler, cilt bakımı ve kozmetik ürünleri sunan seçkin ve lüks bir konsept parfümeri.

highlights.name: Himkok
highlights.description: One of the world's best cocktail bars, this award-winning speakeasy features an in-house distillery and emphasizes unique Norwegian flavors and house-made spirits.
highlights.description_en: One of the world's best cocktail bars, this award-winning speakeasy features an in-house distillery and emphasizes unique Norwegian flavors and house-made spirits.
highlights.description_tr: Dünyanın en iyi kokteyl barlarından biri olan ödüllü mekan. Bünyesindeki damıtımevi ile geleneksel Norveç aromalarını ve kendi üretimi olan içkileri ön plana çıkarır.

highlights.name: Historical Museum
highlights.description: Housed in a stunning Art Nouveau building, this museum showcases Norway's largest collection of prehistoric and medieval artifacts, including magnificent Viking gold treasures.
highlights.description_en: Housed in a stunning Art Nouveau building, this museum showcases Norway's largest collection of prehistoric and medieval artifacts, including magnificent Viking gold treasures.
highlights.description_tr: Görkemli bir Art Nouveau binasında yer alan müze, muazzam Viking altın hazineleri de dahil olmak üzere Norveç'in en büyük tarih öncesi ve Orta Çağ eserleri koleksiyonuna ev sahipliği yapar.

highlights.name: Holberg Statue
highlights.description: Monument to writer Ludvig Holberg flanked by his famous comedy characters Henrik and Pernille.
highlights.description_en: Monument to writer Ludvig Holberg flanked by his famous comedy characters Henrik and Pernille.
highlights.description_tr: Yazar Ludvig Holberg'in, komedi karakterleri Henrik ve Pernille ile birlikte tasvir edildiği anıt.

highlights.name: Holmenkollen Ski Museum
highlights.description: World's oldest ski museum, located inside the Olympic ski jump with panoramic city views.
highlights.description_en: World's oldest ski museum, located inside the Olympic ski jump with panoramic city views.
highlights.tips: Kuleye asansörle çıkabilirsiniz, manzara nefes kesici.
highlights.tips_en: You can take the elevator to the tower, view is breathtaking.
highlights.description_tr: Olimpik kayak atlama tepesinin içinde yer alan, dünyanın en eski kayak müzesi.

highlights.name: Hovedøya
highlights.description: Closest island to city center. Famous for monastery ruins and beaches.
highlights.description_en: Closest island to city center. Famous for monastery ruins and beaches.
highlights.tips_en: You can take the ferry with your city ticket.

highlights.name: Hrimnir Ramen
highlights.description: Innovative Nordic-style ramen using local ingredients and handmade heritage grain noodles.
highlights.description_en: Innovative Nordic-style ramen using local ingredients and handmade heritage grain noodles.
highlights.description_tr: Yerel malzemeler ve el yapımı özel tahıl erişteleriyle sunulan yenilikçi Иskandinav tarzı ramen.

highlights.name: Huk Beach
highlights.description: Popular beach in Bygdøy. Part of it is nudist beach.
highlights.description_en: Popular beach in Bygdøy. Part of it is nudist beach.
highlights.tips_en: Very crowded in summer, go early.

highlights.name: Ibsen Museum
highlights.description: The meticulously restored final home of playwright Henrik Ibsen, offering guided apartment tours.
highlights.description_en: The meticulously restored final home of playwright Henrik Ibsen, offering guided apartment tours.
highlights.description_tr: Ünlü oyun yazarı Henrik Ibsen'in titizlikle restore edilmiş son evi ve dairesi.

highlights.name: Ille Brød
highlights.description: Artisan sourdough bakery utilizing stone-milled organic flour and ancient grains.
highlights.description_en: Artisan sourdough bakery utilizing stone-milled organic flour and ancient grains.
highlights.description_tr: Taş değirmen organik unlar ve antik tahıllar kullanan zanaatkar ekşi mayalı fırın.

highlights.name: Illegal Burger
highlights.description: One of the best burgers in town, cooked over charcoal.
highlights.description_en: One of the best burgers in town, cooked over charcoal.
highlights.tips: Yer bulmak zor olabilir ama beklemeye değer.
highlights.tips_en: Hard to find a seat but worth the wait.

highlights.name: Ingierstrand Beach
highlights.description: Scenic beach complex featuring iconic 1930s functionalist architecture and a diving tower.
highlights.description_en: Scenic beach complex featuring iconic 1930s functionalist architecture and a diving tower.
highlights.description_tr: 1930'ların ikonik fonksiyonel mimarisi ve atlama kulesiyle ünlü manzaralı plaj kompleksi.

highlights.name: Intercultural Museum
highlights.description: Museum in Grønland dedicated to migration history and cultural diversity in Norway.
highlights.description_en: Museum in Grønland dedicated to migration history and cultural diversity in Norway.
highlights.description_tr: Grønland'da bulunan, Norveç'teki göç tarihine ve kültürel çeşitliliğe odaklanan müze.

highlights.name: Izakaya
highlights.description: Cozy Japanese gastropub (hole-in-the-wall) famous for sake and authentic small shared dishes.
highlights.description_en: Cozy Japanese gastropub (hole-in-the-wall) famous for sake and authentic small shared dishes.
highlights.description_tr: Sake ve otantik Japon atıştırmalıklarıyla (mezeleriyle) ünlü, samimi bir Japon gastropub'ı.

highlights.name: Java Espressobar
highlights.description: Pioneering specialty coffee shop co-founded by the first World Barista Champion.
highlights.description_en: Pioneering specialty coffee shop co-founded by the first World Barista Champion.
highlights.description_tr: Dünyanın ilk Barista Şampiyonu tarafından kurulan, Oslo'nun öncü nitelikli kahve dükkanlarından biri.

highlights.name: KaffeBrenneriet
highlights.description: Norway's leading specialty coffee chain (est. 1994), focusing on direct trade and expert roasting.
highlights.description_en: Norway's leading specialty coffee chain (est. 1994), focusing on direct trade and expert roasting.
highlights.description_tr: 1994'te kurulan, doğrudan ticaret ve uzman kavurma tekniklerine odaklanan Norveç'in lider nitelikli kahve zinciri.

highlights.name: Kampen Neighborhood
highlights.description: Quiet and authentic neighborhood with colorful wooden houses.
highlights.description_en: Quiet and authentic neighborhood with colorful wooden houses.
highlights.tips: Yerel bir kafe bulun ve dinlenin.
highlights.tips_en: Find a local cafe and rest.

highlights.name: Karl Johan Statue
highlights.description: Equestrian statue of King Karl Johan standing prominently in front of the Royal Palace.
highlights.description_en: Equestrian statue of King Karl Johan standing prominently in front of the Royal Palace.
highlights.description_tr: Kraliyet Sarayı'nın önünde heybetli bir şekilde duran Kral Karl Johan'ın atlı heykelidir.

highlights.name: Kikutstua
highlights.description: Popular forest cabin in Nordmarka serving traditional food with panoramic lake views.
highlights.description_en: Popular forest cabin in Nordmarka serving traditional food with panoramic lake views.
highlights.description_tr: Nordmarka ormanında, Bjørnsjøen gölü manzaralı ve geleneksel yemekler sunan popüler dağ evi.

highlights.name: Kiosk!
highlights.description: Independent neighborhood coffee bar in Galgeberg with a strong community focus.
highlights.description_en: Independent neighborhood coffee bar in Galgeberg with a strong community focus.
highlights.description_tr: Galgeberg'de bulunan, mahalle kültürünü yansıtan bağımsız ve nitelikli bir kahve barı.

highlights.name: Kobberhaughytta
highlights.description: DNT cabin in Nordmarka offering panoramic forest views and boat rentals on the nearby lake.
highlights.description_en: DNT cabin in Nordmarka offering panoramic forest views and boat rentals on the nearby lake.
highlights.description_tr: Nordmarka'da bulunan, panoramik orman manzarası ve yakınındaki gölde tekne kiralama imkanı sunan DNT dağ evi.

highlights.name: Koie Ramen
highlights.description: Authentic ramen shop near Torggata making its own noodles and slow-cooked rich broths.
highlights.description_en: Authentic ramen shop near Torggata making its own noodles and slow-cooked rich broths.
highlights.description_tr: Torggata yakınında, kendi eriştesini yapan ve ağır ateşte pişmiş zengin bulyonlarıyla ünlü otantik ramen dükkanı.

highlights.name: Kok Oslo
highlights.description: Floating sauna boats on the fjord. You can both warm up and swim.
highlights.description_en: Floating sauna boats on the fjord. You can both warm up and swim.
highlights.tips_en: You can rent a private boat.

highlights.name: Kon-Tiki Museum
highlights.description: See the legendary rafts Kon-Tiki and Ra II which Thor Heyerdahl crossed oceans with.
highlights.description_en: See the legendary rafts Kon-Tiki and Ra II which Thor Heyerdahl crossed oceans with.
highlights.tips: Academy Ödüllü belgesel her gün gösteriliyor.
highlights.tips_en: Academy Award-winning documentary is shown daily.

highlights.name: Kulturhuset
highlights.description: Cultural center hosting concerts, stand-up and events.
highlights.description_en: Cultural center hosting concerts, stand-up and events.
highlights.tips_en: Go after checking the program.

highlights.name: Kulturkirken Jakob
highlights.description: Repurposed 19th-century church now serving as a unique cultural venue for concerts and performances.
highlights.description_en: Repurposed 19th-century church now serving as a unique cultural venue for concerts and performances.
highlights.description_tr: Konserler ve performanslar için eşsiz bir kültür mekanına dönüştürülmüş 19. yüzyıl kilisesi.

highlights.name: Kveitemjøl
highlights.description: Artisan craft bakery at Aker Brygge known for exceptional sourdough bread and cinnamon buns.
highlights.description_en: Artisan craft bakery at Aker Brygge known for exceptional sourdough bread and cinnamon buns.
highlights.description_tr: Aker Brygge'de bulunan, olağanüstü ekşi mayalı ekmekleri ve tarçınlı çörekleriyle tanınan zanaatkar fırın.

highlights.name: Langøyene
highlights.description: A popular recreation island in the Oslofjord known for its large beach, camping, and boat connections.
highlights.description_en: A popular recreation island in the Oslofjord known for its large beach, camping, and boat connections.
highlights.description_tr: Geniş plajı, kamp alanları ve feribot bağlantılarıyla bilinen, Oslo fiyordundaki popüler dinlenme adası.

highlights.name: Liebling
highlights.description: Cozy neighborhood cafe in Grünerløkka (now Babbo Øvrefoss) known for sourdough and relaxed vibes.
highlights.description_en: Cozy neighborhood cafe in Grünerløkka (now Babbo Øvrefoss) known for sourdough and relaxed vibes.
highlights.description_tr: Grünerløkka'da bulunan (şimdiki adıyla Babbo Øvrefoss), ekşi mayalı ürünleri ve rahat ortamıyla ünlü mahalle kafesi.

highlights.name: Lilloseter
highlights.description: Traditional forest lodge in Lillomarka, a central hub for hiking and skiing since 1918.
highlights.description_en: Traditional forest lodge in Lillomarka, a central hub for hiking and skiing since 1918.
highlights.description_tr: Lillomarka'da bulunan, 1918'den beri yürüyüş ve kayak rotalarının merkezi olan geleneksel orman kulübesi.

highlights.name: Lindøya
highlights.description: Idyllic island in the inner Oslofjord famous for its colorful summer cabins and quiet swimming spots.
highlights.description_en: Idyllic island in the inner Oslofjord famous for its colorful summer cabins and quiet swimming spots.
highlights.description_tr: Renkli yazlık kulübeleri ve sakin yüzme yerleriyle ünlü, Oslo fiyordunun iç kısımlarında yer alan pastoral ada.

highlights.name: Lofthus Samvirkelag
highlights.description: Known as Oslo's best pizzeria. Try reindeer pizza.
highlights.description_en: Known as Oslo's best pizzeria. Try reindeer pizza.
highlights.tips: Beyaz soslu pizzaları (Hvit pizza) çok iyidir.
highlights.tips_en: Their white sauce pizzas (Hvit pizza) are very good.

highlights.name: Lush Dive
highlights.description: Premium stationery and fountain pen boutique in Grünerløkka featuring global design products.
highlights.description_en: Premium stationery and fountain pen boutique in Grünerløkka featuring global design products.
highlights.description_tr: Grünerløkka'da bulunan, dünya çapında tasarım ürünleri ve dolma kalemler sunan butik kırtasiye.

highlights.name: Maaemo
highlights.description: 3 Michelin starred, pinnacle of Norwegian cuisine. Unforgettable experience.
highlights.description_en: 3 Michelin starred, pinnacle of Norwegian cuisine. Unforgettable experience.
highlights.tips_en: Reservation months in advance is a must.

highlights.name: Maemo Restaurant
highlights.description: Norway's only three Michelin star restaurant.
highlights.description_en: Norway's only three Michelin star restaurant.
highlights.tips_en: Reservation needed months in advance.

highlights.name: Maridalsvannet
highlights.description: Oslo's largest lake and main drinking water reservoir, surrounded by scenic hiking trails.
highlights.description_en: Oslo's largest lake and main drinking water reservoir, surrounded by scenic hiking trails.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo'nun en büyük gölü ve ana içme suyu rezervuarı; etrafı manzaralı yürüyüş parkurlarıyla çevrilidir.

highlights.name: Mariholtet Sportsstue
highlights.description: Beloved sports lodge in Østmarka by the Elvåga lake, famous for its fresh cinnamon buns.
highlights.description_en: Beloved sports lodge in Østmarka by the Elvåga lake, famous for its fresh cinnamon buns.
highlights.description_tr: Østmarka'da, Elvåga gölü kıyısında bulunan ve taze tarçınlı çörekleriyle ünlü popüler sporcu durağı.

highlights.name: Mathallen Oslo
highlights.description: Vibrant indoor food hall at Vulkan featuring over 30 specialty shops, cafes, and eateries.
highlights.description_en: Vibrant indoor food hall at Vulkan featuring over 30 specialty shops, cafes, and eateries.
highlights.tips_en: Drink fish soup at Fiskeriet.
highlights.description_tr: Vulkan'da yer alan, 30'dan fazla uzman dükkan, kafe ve restorana ev sahipliği yapan canlı gurme merkezi.

highlights.name: Mathallen Oslo (Shops)
highlights.description: Vibrant indoor food hall at Vulkan featuring over 30 specialty shops, cafes, and eateries.
highlights.description_en: Vibrant indoor food hall at Vulkan featuring over 30 specialty shops, cafes, and eateries.
highlights.description_tr: Vulkan'da yer alan, 30'dan fazla uzman dükkan, kafe ve restorana ev sahipliği yapan canlı gurme merkezi.

highlights.name: Mendels Oslo
highlights.description: High-end Parisian pastry shop on Karl Johans Gate, fusion of French and Moroccan artistry.
highlights.description_en: High-end Parisian pastry shop on Karl Johans Gate, fusion of French and Moroccan artistry.
highlights.description_tr: Karl Johans Gate'de bulunan, Fransız ve Fas sanatının birleşimi olan yüksek kaliteli pastane.

highlights.name: Mini Bottle Gallery
highlights.description: The world's largest collection of miniature bottles, featuring eccentric installations over three floors.
highlights.description_en: The world's largest collection of miniature bottles, featuring eccentric installations over three floors.
highlights.description_tr: Üç kat üzerinde sergilenen ilginç enstalasyonlarıyla dünyanın en büyük minyatür şişe koleksiyonu.

highlights.name: Mjøl Bakeri
highlights.description: Modern artisan bakery in Grünerløkka specializing in organic sourdough and seasonal pastries.
highlights.description_en: Modern artisan bakery in Grünerløkka specializing in organic sourdough and seasonal pastries.
highlights.description_tr: Grünerløkka'da bulunan, organik ekşi mayalı ürünler ve mevsimlik hamur işlerinde uzmanlaşmış modern butik fırın.

highlights.name: Munch Museum
highlights.description: Vertical museum hosting Edvard Munch's vast collection including 'The Scream'.
highlights.description_en: Vertical museum hosting Edvard Munch's vast collection including 'The Scream'.
highlights.tips: En üst kattaki bardan Oslo manzarası harikadır.
highlights.tips_en: Oslo view from the top floor bar is wonderful.

highlights.name: Munch Museum (MUNCH)
highlights.description: Spectacular waterfront museum dedicated to Edvard Munch, housing the world's largest collection of his work.
highlights.description_en: Spectacular waterfront museum dedicated to Edvard Munch, housing the world's largest collection of his work.
highlights.description_tr: Bjørvika kıyısında, Edvard Munch'un dünyadaki en büyük eser koleksiyonuna ev sahipliği yapan görkemli müze.

highlights.name: Nakholmen
highlights.description: Idyllic island in the Oslofjord known for its peaceful atmosphere and vibrant summer cottages.
highlights.description_en: Idyllic island in the Oslofjord known for its peaceful atmosphere and vibrant summer cottages.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo Fiyordu'nda, huzurlu atmosferi ve renkli yazlık kulübeleriyle bilinen pitoresk ada.

highlights.name: National Museum
highlights.description: Northern Europe's largest art museum opened in 2022. Munch's 'The Scream' is here.
highlights.description_en: Northern Europe's largest art museum opened in 2022. Munch's 'The Scream' is here.
highlights.tips_en: See The Scream painting in the Munch Room.

highlights.name: Natural History Museum
highlights.description: Museum within the Botanical Garden featuring Norway's only complete dinosaur skeletons (Zara and Zelda).
highlights.description_en: Museum within the Botanical Garden featuring Norway's only complete dinosaur skeletons (Zara and Zelda).
highlights.description_tr: Botanik Bahçesi içinde yer alan, Norveç'in tek tam dinozor iskeletlerine (Zara ve Zelda) ev sahipliği yapan müze.

highlights.name: Neongrut
highlights.description: Popular vegan cafe (now Papegøye in Tøyen) known for exceptional coffee and plant-based treats.
highlights.description_en: Popular vegan cafe (now Papegøye in Tøyen) known for exceptional coffee and plant-based treats.
highlights.description_tr: Olağanüstü kahveleri ve bitki bazlı tatlılarıyla tanınan popüler vegan kafe (şimdiki Papegøye, Tøyen).

highlights.name: Nobel Peace Center
highlights.description: Inspiring center telling stories of Nobel Peace Prize and its winners.
highlights.description_en: Inspiring center telling stories of Nobel Peace Prize and its winners.
highlights.tips_en: Digital 'Nobel Field' installation is very impressive.

highlights.name: Nordmarka Forest
highlights.description: Huge forest area just north of Oslo. Ideal for hiking and skiing.
highlights.description_en: Huge forest area just north of Oslo. Ideal for hiking and skiing.
highlights.tips_en: You can start hiking from Sognsvann lake.

highlights.name: Norsk Folkemuseum
highlights.description: Open-air museum with over 160 historic buildings. Stave church is very important.
highlights.description_en: Open-air museum with over 160 historic buildings. Stave church is very important.
highlights.tips: Gol Stave Kilisesi'ni (ahşap kilise) mutlaka görün.
highlights.tips_en: Must see the Gol Stave Church.

highlights.name: Norway Resistance Museum
highlights.description: Moving museum at Akershus Fortress documenting Norway's resistance movement during WWII occupation.
highlights.description_en: Moving museum at Akershus Fortress documenting Norway's resistance movement during WWII occupation.
highlights.description_tr: Akershus Kalesi'nde bulunan, II. Dünya Savaşı işgali sırasındaki Norveç direniş hareketini belgeleyen etkileyici müze.

highlights.name: Norwegian Maritime Museum
highlights.description: Museum telling Norway's maritime history.
highlights.description_en: Museum telling Norway's maritime history.
highlights.tips: Bygdøy'daki diğer müzelerle birlikte ziyaret edin.
highlights.tips_en: Visit with other museums in Bygdøy.

highlights.name: Old Aker Church (Gamle Aker Kirke)
highlights.description: Oslo's oldest building (c. 1080), a medieval stone church still in use.
highlights.description_en: Oslo's oldest building (c. 1080), a medieval stone church still in use.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo'nun ayakta kalan en eski binası (yaklaşık 1080 yapımı), halen aktif olan orta çağ taş kilisesi.

highlights.name: Oslo Botanical Garden
highlights.description: City's oldest garden hosting thousands of plant species.
highlights.description_en: City's oldest garden hosting thousands of plant species.
highlights.tips: Palmiye Evi ve Victoria Evi seralarını gezin.
highlights.tips_en: Visit Palm House and Victoria House greenhouses.

highlights.name: Oslo Camping
highlights.description: Unique indoor mini-golf bar in Møllergata offering 18 creative holes and a vibrant club atmosphere.
highlights.description_en: Unique indoor mini-golf bar in Møllergata offering 18 creative holes and a vibrant club atmosphere.
highlights.description_tr: Møllergata'da yer alan, 18 yaratıcı parkur ve canlı bir kulüp atmosferi sunan eşsiz kapalı mini golf barı.

highlights.name: Oslo Cathedral
highlights.description: Oslo's main cathedral. Royal weddings are held here.
highlights.description_en: Oslo's main cathedral. Royal weddings are held here.
highlights.tips_en: Ceiling frescoes are very beautiful.

highlights.name: Oslo Cathedral (Domkirke)
highlights.description: Consecrated in 1697, featuring a Baroque interior, vibrant ceiling murals, and a historic bazaar.
highlights.description_en: Consecrated in 1697, featuring a Baroque interior, vibrant ceiling murals, and a historic bazaar.
highlights.description_tr: 1697'de ibadete açılan, Barok iç mekanı, tavan resimleri ve tarihi çarşısıyla ünlü katedral.

highlights.name: Oslo City Hall
highlights.description: Iconic building where Nobel Peace Prize ceremony is held. Has huge murals.
highlights.description_en: Iconic building where Nobel Peace Prize ceremony is held. Has huge murals.
highlights.tips_en: Free tours are organized.

highlights.name: Oslo City Museum
highlights.description: Located in historic Frogner Manor, showcasing Oslo's urban development through varied exhibitions.
highlights.description_en: Located in historic Frogner Manor, showcasing Oslo's urban development through varied exhibitions.
highlights.description_tr: Tarihi Frogner Malikanesi'nde yer alan, Oslo'nun kentsel gelişimini çeşitli sergilerle sunan müze.

highlights.name: Oslo Lions (Stortinget)
highlights.description: Iconic granite lion statues (Løvebakken) guarding the entrance to the Norwegian Parliament building.
highlights.description_en: Iconic granite lion statues (Løvebakken) guarding the entrance to the Norwegian Parliament building.
highlights.description_tr: Norveç Parlamento Binası'nın (Stortinget) girişini koruyan, granitten oyulmuş ikonik aslan heykelleri (Løvebakken).

highlights.name: Oslo Opera House
highlights.description: Modern architectural wonder inspired by glaciers, where you can walk on the roof.
highlights.description_en: Modern architectural wonder inspired by glaciers, where you can walk on the roof.
highlights.tips: Çatısına kadar yürüyüp fiyort manzarasını izleyin.
highlights.tips_en: Walk up to the roof and watch the fjord view.

highlights.name: Oslo Tree
highlights.description: Stunning 14-meter light installation in Trettenparken featuring 150,000 computer-controlled LED lights.
highlights.description_en: Stunning 14-meter light installation in Trettenparken featuring 150,000 computer-controlled LED lights.
highlights.description_tr: Trettenparken'de yer alan, 150.000 bilgisayar kontrollü LED ışıktan oluşan 14 metrelik göz alıcı ışık enstalasyonu.

highlights.name: Oslofjord Islands
highlights.description: Islands in Oslo fjord reached by ferry. Ideal for picnics and swimming in summer.
highlights.description_en: Islands in Oslo fjord reached by ferry. Ideal for picnics and swimming in summer.
highlights.tips: Hovedøya ve Langøyene en popüler adalardır.
highlights.tips_en: Hovedøya and Langøyene are most popular islands.

highlights.name: Palace Park
highlights.description: Large and beautiful public park surrounding the Royal Palace.
highlights.description_en: Large and beautiful public park surrounding the Royal Palace.
highlights.tips_en: Watch the changing of the guard at 13:30.

highlights.name: Paleet
highlights.description: Sophisticated shopping destination on Karl Johans gate known for its high-end fashion and refined architecture.
highlights.description_en: Sophisticated shopping destination on Karl Johans gate known for its high-end fashion and refined architecture.
highlights.description_tr: Karl Johans gate'de bulunan, lüks moda markaları ve rafine mimarisiyle ünlü sofistike alışveriş merkezi.

highlights.name: Paradisbukta Beach
highlights.description: Quiet and family-friendly beach meaning Paradise Bay.
highlights.description_en: Quiet and family-friendly beach meaning Paradise Bay.
highlights.tips_en: Shallow waters are safe for children.

highlights.name: Paradox Museum Oslo
highlights.description: Interactive museum with over 70 mind-bending optical illusions and paradox-based exhibits.
highlights.description_en: Interactive museum with over 70 mind-bending optical illusions and paradox-based exhibits.
highlights.description_tr: 70'den fazla zihin bulandıran optik illüzyon ve paradoks temalı sergi sunan interaktif müze.

highlights.name: Parliament Building (Stortinget)
highlights.description: The iconic seat of Norway's parliament, opened in 1866 and known for its eclectic yellow brick architecture.
highlights.description_en: The iconic seat of Norway's parliament, opened in 1866 and known for its eclectic yellow brick architecture.
highlights.tips_en: Tours are organized on weekends.
highlights.description_tr: Norveç parlamentosunun 1866'da açılan ikonik binası; eklektik sarı tuğla mimarisiyle tanınır.

highlights.name: Peer Gynt Sculpture Park
highlights.description: Open-air sculpture park in Løren depicting Henrik Ibsen's play 'Peer Gynt' act by act.
highlights.description_en: Open-air sculpture park in Løren depicting Henrik Ibsen's play 'Peer Gynt' act by act.
highlights.description_tr: Løren'de bulunan, Henrik Ibsen'in 'Peer Gynt' oyununu sahne sahne tasvir eden açık hava heykel parkı.

highlights.name: Pust Kaffebar
highlights.description: Popular student-favored coffee bar at Majorstuen known for its Jacu coffee and campus-café vibe.
highlights.description_en: Popular student-favored coffee bar at Majorstuen known for its Jacu coffee and campus-café vibe.
highlights.description_tr: Majorstuen'de bulunan, Jacu kahvesi ve kampüs kafesi atmosferiyle öğrenciler arasında popüler olan mekan.

highlights.name: Restaurant Schrøder
highlights.description: Historic restaurant serving traditional Norwegian food, frequented by Harry Hole novels.
highlights.description_en: Historic restaurant serving traditional Norwegian food, frequented by Harry Hole novels.
highlights.tips_en: You must try 'Kjøttkaker' (Norwegian meatballs).

highlights.name: Robot
highlights.description: Iconic vintage store in Grünerløkka's Markveien, specializing in handpicked 90s and Y2K clothing.
highlights.description_en: Iconic vintage store in Grünerløkka's Markveien, specializing in handpicked 90s and Y2K clothing.
highlights.description_tr: Grünerløkka'da bulunan, 90'lar ve Y2K dönemine ait özenle seçilmiş kıyafetlerle ünlü ikonik vintage dükkanı.

highlights.name: Rodeløkka
highlights.description: Neighborhood full of colorful wooden houses similar to Damstredet but lesser known.
highlights.description_en: Neighborhood full of colorful wooden houses similar to Damstredet but lesser known.
highlights.tips: Turistlerden uzak, sessiz bir yürüyüş için ideal.
highlights.tips_en: Ideal for a quiet walk away from tourists.

highlights.name: Royal Palace Oslo
highlights.description: Official residence of Norwegian King. Interior tours in summer.
highlights.description_en: Official residence of Norwegian King. Interior tours in summer.
highlights.tips_en: Guard change at 13:30 daily.

highlights.name: Rustadsaga
highlights.description: Historic forest lodge in Østmarka by Nøklevann lake, known for its homemade food and friendly animals.
highlights.description_en: Historic forest lodge in Østmarka by Nøklevann lake, known for its homemade food and friendly animals.
highlights.description_tr: Østmarka'daki Nøklevann gölü kıyısında bulunan, ev yapımı yemekleri ve cana yakın hayvanlarıyla ünlü tarihi orman kulübesi.

highlights.name: Røtter St. Hanshaugen
highlights.description: Oslo's flagship organic grocery store offering a wide range of natural health products and local goods.
highlights.description_en: Oslo's flagship organic grocery store offering a wide range of natural health products and local goods.
highlights.description_tr: Doğal sağlık ürünleri ve yerel gıdalar sunan, Oslo'nun en önemli organik marketlerinden biri.

highlights.name: Røør
highlights.description: Craft beer heaven in Rosenkrantzgate featuring over 60 taps and shuffleboard tables.
highlights.description_en: Craft beer heaven in Rosenkrantzgate featuring over 60 taps and shuffleboard tables.
highlights.description_tr: Rosenkrantzgate'de bulunan, 60'tan fazla musluk seçeneği ve shuffleboard masalarıyla ünlü bir bira cenneti.

highlights.name: Salt
highlights.description: Sauna, concert and food court complex by the fjord.
highlights.description_en: Sauna, concert and food court complex by the fjord.
highlights.tips: Saunadan sonra fiyoda atlamak bir gelenektir!
highlights.tips_en: Jumping into the fjord after sauna is a tradition!DM

highlights.name: Salt Art & Music
highlights.description: Nomadic art and culture project. Offers sauna and outdoor swimming.
highlights.description_en: Nomadic art and culture project. Offers sauna and outdoor swimming.
highlights.tips_en: Check the event schedule.

highlights.name: Sandbakken Sportsstue
highlights.description: Family-friendly sports lodge in Østmarka famous for its warm atmosphere and traditional homemade waffles.
highlights.description_en: Family-friendly sports lodge in Østmarka famous for its warm atmosphere and traditional homemade waffles.
highlights.description_tr: Østmarka'da bulunan, sıcak atmosferi ve geleneksel ev yapımı vafları ile ünlü aile dostu sporcu durağı.

highlights.name: Sauna at Langkaia (SALT)
highlights.description: Cultural arena at Langkaia featuring a unique 'sauna village' and views of the Opera House.
highlights.description_en: Cultural arena at Langkaia featuring a unique 'sauna village' and views of the Opera House.
highlights.description_tr: Langkaia'da bulunan, eşsiz bir 'sauna köyü' ve Opera Binası manzarası sunan kültürel etkinlik alanı.

highlights.name: Schouskjelleren Mikrobryggeri
highlights.description: Atmospheric microbrewery located in the historic vaulted cellars of the former Schous brewery.
highlights.description_en: Atmospheric microbrewery located in the historic vaulted cellars of the former Schous brewery.
highlights.description_tr: Eski Schous bira fabrikasının tarihi tonozlu mahzenlerinde yer alan atmosferik mikro-birahane.

highlights.name: She Lies
highlights.description: Monumental floating sculpture of glass and steel by Monica Bonvicini, inspired by Romantic landscape painting.
highlights.description_en: Monumental floating sculpture of glass and steel by Monica Bonvicini, inspired by Romantic landscape painting.
highlights.description_tr: Monica Bonvicini imzalı, Romantik dönem manzara resimlerinden ilham alan, cam ve çelikten devasa yüzen heykel.

highlights.name: Skjennungstua
highlights.description: Beloved sports lodge in Nordmarka offering homemade cakes and magnificent views across the forest.
highlights.description_en: Beloved sports lodge in Nordmarka offering homemade cakes and magnificent views across the forest.
highlights.description_tr: Nordmarka'da bulunan, ev yapımı pastaları ve orman üzerinden geçen muazzam manzarasıyla sevilen sporcu durağı.

highlights.name: Sofienberg Park
highlights.description: Large, vibrant green space in Grünerløkka (former cemetery) and a popular social hub for locals.
highlights.description_en: Large, vibrant green space in Grünerløkka (former cemetery) and a popular social hub for locals.
highlights.description_tr: Grünerløkka'da yer alan (eski mezarlık), yerel halk için popüler bir sosyal merkez olan geniş ve canlı yeşil alan.

highlights.name: Sognsvann Lake
highlights.description: Weekend getaway spot for locals. Ideal lake for walking and picnic.
highlights.description_en: Weekend getaway spot for locals. Ideal lake for walking and picnic.
highlights.tips_en: Easily reached by metro (T-bane).

highlights.name: St. Hanshaugen Park
highlights.description: Classic hilly park offering panoramic views over Oslo, romantic atmosphere, and intimate picnic spots.
highlights.description_en: Classic hilly park offering panoramic views over Oslo, romantic atmosphere, and intimate picnic spots.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo üzerinden panoramik manzaralar, romantik bir atmosfer ve samimi piknik noktaları sunan klasik tepelik park.

highlights.name: St. Olav's Cathedral
highlights.description: The Neo-Gothic Roman Catholic cathedral of Oslo, consecrated in 1856 and featuring a relic of St. Olav.
highlights.description_en: The Neo-Gothic Roman Catholic cathedral of Oslo, consecrated in 1856 and featuring a relic of St. Olav.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo'nun 1856'da açılan Neo-Gotik Roma Katolik katedrali; içinde Aziz Olav'a ait bir emanet bulunur.

highlights.name: Stockfleths
highlights.description: Historic coffee house (est. 1895) with a legacy of world-class baristas and high-quality specialty beans.
highlights.description_en: Historic coffee house (est. 1895) with a legacy of world-class baristas and high-quality specialty beans.
highlights.description_tr: 1895'te kurulan, dünya çapında baristalar yetiştirmiş ve yüksek kaliteli nitelikli çekirdekleriyle ünlü tarihi kahve evi.

highlights.name: Strøget
highlights.description: Vibrant and energetic nightclub located in a historic pedestrian passage near Torggata.
highlights.description_en: Vibrant and energetic nightclub located in a historic pedestrian passage near Torggata.
highlights.description_tr: Torggata yakınındaki tarihi bir yaya pasajında yer alan, canlı ve enerjik bir gece kulübü.

highlights.name: Summit Bar
highlights.description: Chic cocktail bar designed by Snøhetta, located on the 21st floor with panoramic views of Oslo Fjord.
highlights.description_en: Chic cocktail bar designed by Snøhetta, located on the 21st floor with panoramic views of Oslo Fjord.
highlights.description_tr: Snøhetta tarafından tasarlanan, 21. katta yer alan ve Oslo Fiyordu'nun panoramik manzarasını sunan şık kokteyl barı.

highlights.name: Supreme Roastworks
highlights.description: Place where you can drink coffee from world champion baristas.
highlights.description_en: Place where you can drink coffee from world champion baristas.
highlights.tips_en: Order Aeropress brew.

highlights.name: Syverkiosken
highlights.description: Legendary traditional hot dog stand serving classic wieners in a secret family-recipe stock since 1936.
highlights.description_en: Legendary traditional hot dog stand serving classic wieners in a secret family-recipe stock since 1936.
highlights.description_tr: 1936'den beri gizli bir aile tarifiyle hazırlanan sosisli sandviçler sunan efsanevi geleneksel büfe.

highlights.name: Sørenga Sjøbad
highlights.description: Seawater pools and sunbathing areas in city center.
highlights.description_en: Seawater pools and sunbathing areas in city center.
highlights.tips_en: Diving platforms are very fun.

highlights.name: Talor & Jørgen
highlights.description: Acclaimed coffee roastery and donut shop known for creative flavors and high-quality specialty coffee.
highlights.description_en: Acclaimed coffee roastery and donut shop known for creative flavors and high-quality specialty coffee.
highlights.description_tr: Yaratıcı aromalı çörekleri ve yüksek kaliteli nitelikli kahveleriyle tanınan ünlü kahve kavurma evi ve çörekçi.

highlights.name: Technical Museum Oslo
highlights.description: Interactive science and technology museum.
highlights.description_en: Interactive science and technology museum.
highlights.tips_en: Children can spend hours.

highlights.name: Telthusbakken
highlights.description: Another cute wooden houses street near Damstredet overlooking community gardens.
highlights.description_en: Another cute wooden houses street near Damstredet overlooking community gardens.
highlights.tips_en: Watch the gardens while walking downhill.

highlights.name: The Angry Boy (Sinnataggen)
highlights.description: Iconic bronze sculpture by Gustav Vigeland in Frogner Park, famous for its raw emotional expression.
highlights.description_en: Iconic bronze sculpture by Gustav Vigeland in Frogner Park, famous for its raw emotional expression.
highlights.description_tr: Frogner Parkı'nda yer alan, ham duygusal ifadesiyle ünlü Gustav Vigeland imzalı ikonik bronz heykel.

highlights.name: The Glove (Hansk)
highlights.description: Sculptural fountain monument by Wenche Gulbransen marking where Christian IV decided to rebuild Oslo.
highlights.description_en: Sculptural fountain monument by Wenche Gulbransen marking where Christian IV decided to rebuild Oslo.
highlights.description_tr: Christian IV'ün Oslo'yu yeniden inşa etmeye karar verdiği noktayı simgeleyen, Wenche Gulbransen imzalı görkemli heykel-çeşme.

highlights.name: The Monolith (Monolitten)
highlights.description: Towering 17-meter granite sculpture in Vigeland Park featuring 121 intertwined human figures climbing upward.
highlights.description_en: Towering 17-meter granite sculpture in Vigeland Park featuring 121 intertwined human figures climbing upward.
highlights.description_tr: Vigeland Parkı'nın kalbinde yer alan, 121 adet birbirine geçmiş insan figüründen oluşan 17 metrelik devasa granit heykel.

highlights.name: The Tiger Statue
highlights.description: Famous bronze tiger statue at Jernbanetorget, symbolizing Oslo's nickname 'Tigerstaden' since 2000.
highlights.description_en: Famous bronze tiger statue at Jernbanetorget, symbolizing Oslo's nickname 'Tigerstaden' since 2000.
highlights.description_tr: 2000 yılından beri Oslo'nun 'Kaplan Şehri' (Tigerstaden) lakabını simgeleyen ünlü bronz kaplan heykeli.

highlights.name: The Villa
highlights.description: Renowned underground electronica club in a basement setting, famous for its intimate 'dungeon' vibe and techno music.
highlights.description_en: Renowned underground electronica club in a basement setting, famous for its intimate 'dungeon' vibe and techno music.
highlights.description_tr: Bodrum katındaki özgün atmosferi, 'zindan' benzeri havası ve tekno müziğiyle ünlü, Oslo'nun öncü elektronik müzik kulübü.

highlights.name: The Wheel of Life
highlights.description: Symbolic bronze sculpture by Gustav Vigeland representing eternity and the interconnected cycle of human life.
highlights.description_en: Symbolic bronze sculpture by Gustav Vigeland representing eternity and the interconnected cycle of human life.
highlights.description_tr: Vigeland Parkı'nda bulunan, sonsuzluğu ve insan yaşamının birbirine bağlı döngüsünü simgeleyen bronz heykel.

highlights.name: Tilt
highlights.description: Popular retro arcade bar in Torggata featuring Oslo's largest collection of pinball machines and classic games.
highlights.description_en: Popular retro arcade bar in Torggata featuring Oslo's largest collection of pinball machines and classic games.
highlights.description_tr: Torggata'da yer alan, Oslo'nun en geniş langırt ve klasik atari oyunu koleksiyonuna sahip popüler retro oyun barı.

highlights.name: Tim Wendelboe
highlights.description: Place showing as one of the best coffee shops in the world, serving its own roasted coffee.
highlights.description_en: Place showing as one of the best coffee shops in the world, serving its own roasted coffee.
highlights.tips: Sadece kahve odaklıdır, yiyecek çeşidi azdır.
highlights.tips_en: Focused only on coffee, food variety is low.

highlights.name: Tjuvholmen Sculpture Park
highlights.description: Stunning waterfront art space designed by Renzo Piano, featuring works by renowned international contemporary artists.
highlights.description_en: Stunning waterfront art space designed by Renzo Piano, featuring works by renowned international contemporary artists.
highlights.description_tr: Renzo Piano tarafından tasarlanan, dünyaca ünlü modern sanatçıların eserlerine ev sahipliği yapan görkemli sahil heykel parkı.

highlights.name: Torggata Botaniske
highlights.description: Intimate and enchanting cocktail bar with a lush botanical theme, using fresh herbs for innovative craft drinks.
highlights.description_en: Intimate and enchanting cocktail bar with a lush botanical theme, using fresh herbs for innovative craft drinks.
highlights.description_tr: Torggata'da yer alan, bitkilerle bezeli büyüleyici atmosferi ve taze baharatlarla hazırlanan yenilikçi kokteylleriyle ünlü bar.

highlights.name: Trinity Church (Trefoldighetskirken)
highlights.description: Grand Neo-Gothic church (1858) famous for its red brick architecture and a massive copper-clad central dome.
highlights.description_en: Grand Neo-Gothic church (1858) famous for its red brick architecture and a massive copper-clad central dome.
highlights.description_tr: 1858 yapımı, kırmızı tuğla mimarisi ve devasa bakır kaplı merkezi kubbesiyle ünlü görkemli Neo-Gotik kilise.

highlights.name: Tronsmo Bokhandel
highlights.description: Legendary independent bookstore established in 1973, a cultural institution known for its radical curation and comics.
highlights.description_en: Legendary independent bookstore established in 1973, a cultural institution known for its radical curation and comics.
highlights.description_tr: 1973'ten beri hizmet veren, radikal seçkisi ve devasa çizgi roman bölümüyle ünlü efsanevi bağımsız kitapçı.

highlights.name: Tryvann Winter Park
highlights.description: Oslo's ski resort. Accessible by metro.
highlights.description_en: Oslo's ski resort. Accessible by metro.
highlights.tips_en: Open December to March.

highlights.name: Tøyen Park
highlights.description: Large urban park and former site of the Munch Museum, now the main venue for the Øya Festival.
highlights.description_en: Large urban park and former site of the Munch Museum, now the main venue for the Øya Festival.
highlights.description_tr: Munch Müzesi'nin eski yeri olan, günümüzde Øya Festivali'ne ev sahipliği yapan geniş şehir parkı.

highlights.name: Ullevålseter
highlights.description: Historic sports lodge in Nordmarka, a central hub for hikers and skiers famous for its cinnamon buns.
highlights.description_en: Historic sports lodge in Nordmarka, a central hub for hikers and skiers famous for its cinnamon buns.
highlights.description_tr: Nordmarka'da bulunan, yürüyüşçülerin ve kayakçıların uğrak noktası olan ve tarçınlı çörekleriyle ünlü tarihi dağ evi.

highlights.name: University of Oslo
highlights.description: Norway's largest and oldest university.
highlights.description_en: Norway's largest and oldest university.
highlights.tips: Aula'daki Munch duvar resimleri görülmeye değer.
highlights.tips_en: Munch murals in Aula are worth seeing.

highlights.name: Vangen Skistue
highlights.description: Traditional timber lodge in Østmarka featuring a visiting farm with various animals and famous 'Vangen-buns'.
highlights.description_en: Traditional timber lodge in Østmarka featuring a visiting farm with various animals and famous 'Vangen-buns'.
highlights.description_tr: Østmarka'da yer alan, çeşitli hayvanların bulunduğu bir çiftliğe ev sahipliği yapan ve 'Vangen çöreği' ile ünlü geleneksel ahşap kulübe.

highlights.name: Velouria Vintage
highlights.description: Iconic vintage store in Grünerløkka specializing in handpicked 50s-90s clothing and rare band tees.
highlights.description_en: Iconic vintage store in Grünerløkka specializing in handpicked 50s-90s clothing and rare band tees.
highlights.description_tr: Grünerløkka'da bulunan, 50-90'lı yıllara ait özenle seçilmiş kıyafetler ve nadir grup tişörtleriyle ünlü ikonik vintage mağazası.

highlights.name: Vettakollen Viewpoint
highlights.description: Easy hiking destination offering one of the most spectacular panoramic views over Oslo and the fjord.
highlights.description_en: Easy hiking destination offering one of the most spectacular panoramic views over Oslo and the fjord.
highlights.description_tr: Oslo ve fiyort üzerinden en muazzam panoramik manzaralardan birini sunan, kolay ulaşılabilir yürüyüş rotası.

highlights.name: Vigeland Museum
highlights.description: Grand museum dedicated to Gustav Vigeland, located in his former studio and residence.
highlights.description_en: Grand museum dedicated to Gustav Vigeland, located in his former studio and residence.
highlights.description_tr: Gustav Vigeland'ın eski atölyesi ve evi olan, sanatçının eserlerine adanmış görkemli müze.

highlights.name: Vigeland Park
highlights.description: The world's largest sculpture park made by a single artist, featuring over 200 works by Gustav Vigeland.
highlights.description_en: The world's largest sculpture park made by a single artist, featuring over 200 works by Gustav Vigeland.
highlights.tips_en: Find the 'Angry Boy' (Sinnataggen) sculpture.
highlights.description_tr: Gustav Vigeland'ın 200'den fazla eserini barındıran, tek bir sanatçı tarafından yapılmış dünyanın en büyük heykel parkı.

highlights.name: Vippa Food Hall
highlights.description: Venue offering international street food in harbor area.
highlights.description_en: Venue offering international street food in harbor area.
highlights.tips_en: Outdoor area is very nice in summer.

highlights.name: Vippa Oslo
highlights.description: Street food market with great variety set in an old warehouse by the sea.
highlights.description_en: Street food market with great variety set in an old warehouse by the sea.
highlights.tips: Deniz kenarındaki masalarda oturup fiyort havası alın.
highlights.tips_en: Sit at tables by the sea and enjoy the fjord air.

highlights.name: Vulkan District
highlights.description: Sustainable neighborhood converted from old industrial area. Mathallen is here.
highlights.description_en: Sustainable neighborhood converted from old industrial area. Mathallen is here.
highlights.tips: Arı kovanları ve güneş panelleri var.
highlights.tips_en: Has beehives and solar panels.

highlights.name: Vårt Daglige Brød
highlights.description: Charming bakery and cafe in Majorstuen known for high-quality artisan sourdough.
highlights.description_en: Charming bakery and cafe in Majorstuen known for high-quality artisan sourdough.
highlights.description_tr: Majorstuen'de bulunan, yüksek kaliteli el yapımı ekşi mayalı ekmekleriyle tanınan şirin fırın ve kafe.

highlights.name: W.B. Samson
highlights.description: Oslo's oldest bakery chain (est. 1894), famous for its traditional Norwegian 'boller'.
highlights.description_en: Oslo's oldest bakery chain (est. 1894), famous for its traditional Norwegian 'boller'.
highlights.tips_en: Try Skolebrød (coconut bun).
highlights.description_tr: 1894'te kurulan, Oslo'nun en eski fırın zinciri; geleneksel Norveç çörekleriyle (boller) ünlüdür.

highlights.name: Wergeland Statue
highlights.description: Iconic monument of national poet Henrik Wergeland in Spikersuppa.
highlights.description_en: Iconic monument of national poet Henrik Wergeland in Spikersuppa.
highlights.description_tr: Spikersuppa'da bulunan, ulusal şair Henrik Wergeland'a adanmış ikonik anıt.

highlights.name: Åpent Bakeri - Barcode
highlights.description: Modern bakery with amazing breads and pastries.
highlights.description_en: Modern bakery with amazing breads and pastries.
highlights.tips_en: Kanelbolle (cinnamon bun) is very popular.

highlights.name: Åpent Bakeri Inkognito
highlights.description: High-end artisan bakery near the Royal Palace using traditional slow-baking methods.
highlights.description_en: High-end artisan bakery near the Royal Palace using traditional slow-baking methods.
highlights.description_tr: Kraliyet Sarayı yakınında, geleneksel yavaş pişirme yöntemlerini kullanan üst düzey butik fırın.
